00020 /*! 
00021 
00022 \page Txt2DmetChp_description Writing genotype results to a "multi-data" CHP file.
00023 
00024 This program is provided as an example of using the Fusion SDK to write genotype results to an Affymetrix
00025 "multi-data" CHP file. The multi-data CHP file was designed to store a variety of Affymetrix results,
00026 including genotypes and copy number. The Genotyping Console software currently uses the "multi-data" CHP
00027 file for storing genotype results from the BRLMM-P and Birdseed algorithms as well as copy number results
00028 from its copy number algorithms.
00029 
00030 The program is implemented as a command line application. The arguments specify items such as the TSV file
00031 containing the genotype results, algorithm parameters, summary statistics, probe array type, parent CEL file, 
00032 and other items that are stored in the CHP file header.
00033 
00034  */
00035 
00036 #include "calvin_files/converters/chp/src/CmdLine.h"
00037 #include "calvin_files/fusion/src/FusionCELData.h"
00038 #include "calvin_files/parsers/src/GenericFileReader.h"
00039 #include "calvin_files/utils/src/FileUtils.h"
00040 #include "calvin_files/utils/src/StringUtils.h"
00041 #include "calvin_files/writers/src/CalvinCHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter.h"
00042 #include "calvin_files/writers/src/CalvinCHPMultiDataFileWriter.h"
00043 #include "calvin_files/writers/src/GenericDataHeaderUpdater.h"
00044 //

00049 //

00061 static string biAlleleIn;
00062 static string multiAlleleIn;
00063 static string copyNumberIn;

00065 /*! Parse a line into a list.
00066  * @param line The line of data
00067  * @return A list of strings from the line (separated by tabs).
00068  */
00069 static list<string> ParseLine(char *line)
00070 {
00071         list<string> tokens;
00072         const char *sep = "\t";
00073         char *token = strtok(line, sep);
00074         while (token != NULL)
00075         {
00076                 tokens.push_back(token);
00077                 token = strtok(NULL, sep);
00078         }
00079         return tokens;  
00080 }
00081 
00082 static void WriteBiAllelicData(CHPMultiDataFileWriter &writer)
00083 {
00084         if(!biAlleleIn.empty())
00085         {
00086                 DmetBiAllelicData entry;
00087                 writer.SeekToDataSet(DmetBiAllelicMultiDataType);
00088 
00089                 // Open the file
00090                 ifstream instr(biAlleleIn.c_str(), ios::in);
00091                 if (!instr)
00092                 {
00093                         throw string("Unable to read the input file");
00094                 }
00095 
00096                 char line[1024];
00097                 // First line with header
00098                 instr.getline(line, 1024);
00099                 while (instr.getline(line, 1024))
00100                 {
00101                         list<string> cols = ParseLine(line);
00102                         if(cols.size() > 0)
00103                         {
00104                                 list<string>::const_iterator colIt = cols.begin();
00105                                 entry.name = *colIt;
00106                                 ++colIt;
00107                                 entry.call = (u_int8_t)atoi(colIt->c_str());
00108                                 ++colIt;
00109                                 entry.confidence = (float)atof(colIt->c_str());
00110                                 ++colIt;
00111                                 entry.force = (u_int8_t)atoi(colIt->c_str());
00112                                 ++colIt;
00113                                 entry.signalA = (float)atof(colIt->c_str());;
00114                                 ++colIt;
00115                                 entry.signalB = (float)atof(colIt->c_str());;
00116                                 ++colIt;
00117                                 entry.contextA = (u_int8_t)atoi(colIt->c_str());
00118                                 ++colIt;
00119                                 entry.contextB = (u_int8_t)atoi(colIt->c_str());
00120 
00121                                 /*++colIt;
00122                                 entry.metrics.resize(cols.size() - 3);
00123                                 int colIdx = 0;
00124                                 for (; colIt!=cols.end(); colIt++, colIdx++)
00125                                 {
00126                                 if (extraColTypes[colIdx] == "float")
00127                                 {
00128                                 entry.metrics[colIdx].SetValueFloat((float)atof(colIt->c_str()));
00129                                 }
00130                                 else if (extraColTypes[colIdx] == "int")
00131                                 {
00132                                 entry.metrics[colIdx].SetValueInt32(atoi(colIt->c_str()));
00133                                 }
00134                                 else if (extraColTypes[colIdx] == "ubyte")
00135                                 {
00136                                 entry.metrics[colIdx].SetValueUInt8(CallToCode(colIt->c_str()));
00137                                 }
00138                                 }*/
00139 
00140                                 writer.WriteEntry(entry);
00141                         }
00142                         else
00143                         {
00144                                 break;
00145                         }
00146                 }
00147         }
00148 }

00150 static void WriteMultiAllelicData(CHPMultiDataFileWriter &writer)
00151 {
00152         if(!multiAlleleIn.empty())
00153         {
00154                 DmetMultiAllelicData entry;
00155                 writer.SeekToDataSet(DmetMultiAllelicMultiDataType);
00156 
00157                 // Open the file
00158                 ifstream instr(multiAlleleIn.c_str(), ios::in);
00159                 if (!instr)
00160                 {
00161                         throw string("Unable to read the input file");
00162                 }
00163 
00164                 char line[1024];
00165                 // First line with header
00166                 instr.getline(line, 1024);
00167                 while (instr.getline(line, 1024))
00168                 {
00169                         list<string> cols = ParseLine(line);
00170                         if(cols.size() > 0)
00171                         {
00172                                 list<string>::const_iterator colIt = cols.begin();
00173                                 entry.name = *colIt;
00174                                 ++colIt;
00175                                 entry.call = (u_int8_t)atoi(colIt->c_str());
00176                                 ++colIt;
00177                                 entry.confidence = (float)atof(colIt->c_str());
00178                                 ++colIt;
00179                                 entry.force = (u_int8_t)atoi(colIt->c_str());
00180                                 ++colIt;
00181                                 entry.alleleCount = (u_int8_t)atoi(colIt->c_str());
00182                                 ++colIt;
00183                                 entry.signalA = (float)atof(colIt->c_str());;
00184                                 ++colIt;
00185                                 entry.signalB = (float)atof(colIt->c_str());;
00186                                 ++colIt;
00187                                 entry.signalC = (float)atof(colIt->c_str());;
00188                                 ++colIt;
00189                                 entry.signalD = (float)atof(colIt->c_str());;
00190                                 ++colIt;
00191                                 entry.signalE = (float)atof(colIt->c_str());;
00192                                 ++colIt;
00193                                 entry.signalF = (float)atof(colIt->c_str());;
00194                                 ++colIt;
00195                                 entry.contextA = (u_int8_t)atoi(colIt->c_str());
00196                                 ++colIt;
00197                                 entry.contextB = (u_int8_t)atoi(colIt->c_str());
00198                                 ++colIt;
00199                                 entry.contextC = (u_int8_t)atoi(colIt->c_str());
00200                                 ++colIt;
00201                                 entry.contextD = (u_int8_t)atoi(colIt->c_str());
00202                                 ++colIt;
00203                                 entry.contextE = (u_int8_t)atoi(colIt->c_str());
00204                                 ++colIt;
00205                                 entry.contextF = (u_int8_t)atoi(colIt->c_str());
00206 
00207                                 /*++colIt;
00208                                 entry.metrics.resize(cols.size() - 3);
00209                                 int colIdx = 0;
00210                                 for (; colIt!=cols.end(); colIt++, colIdx++)
00211                                 {
00212                                 if (extraColTypes[colIdx] == "float")
00213                                 {
00214                                 entry.metrics[colIdx].SetValueFloat((float)atof(colIt->c_str()));
00215                                 }
00216                                 else if (extraColTypes[colIdx] == "int")
00217                                 {
00218                                 entry.metrics[colIdx].SetValueInt32(atoi(colIt->c_str()));
00219                                 }
00220                                 else if (extraColTypes[colIdx] == "ubyte")
00221                                 {
00222                                 entry.metrics[colIdx].SetValueUInt8(CallToCode(colIt->c_str()));
00223                                 }
00224                                 }*/
00225 
00226                                 writer.WriteEntry(entry);
00227                         }
00228                         else
00229                         {
00230                                 break;
00231                         }
00232                 }
00233         }
00234 }

00236 static void WriteCopyNumberData(CHPMultiDataFileWriter &writer)
00237 {
00238         if(!copyNumberIn.empty())
00239         {
00240                 DmetCopyNumberData entry;
00241                 writer.SeekToDataSet(DmetCopyNumberMultiDataType);
00242         
00243                 // Open the file
00244                 ifstream instr(copyNumberIn.c_str(), ios::in);
00245                 if (!instr)
00246                 {
00247                         throw string("Unable to read the input file");
00248                 }
00249 
00250                 char line[1024];
00251                 // First line with header
00252                 instr.getline(line, 1024);
00253                 while (instr.getline(line, 1024))
00254                 {
00255                         list<string> cols = ParseLine(line);
00256                         if(cols.size() > 0)
00257                         {
00258                                 list<string>::const_iterator colIt = cols.begin();
00259 
00260                                 entry.name = *colIt;
00261                                 ++colIt;
00262                                 entry.call = (int16_t)atoi(colIt->c_str());
00263                                 ++colIt;
00264                                 entry.confidence = (float)atof(colIt->c_str());
00265                                 ++colIt;
00266                                 entry.force = (int16_t)atoi(colIt->c_str());
00267                                 ++colIt;
00268                                 entry.estimate = (float)atof(colIt->c_str());
00269                                 ++colIt;
00270                                 entry.lower = (float)atof(colIt->c_str());
00271                                 ++colIt;
00272                                 entry.upper = (float)atof(colIt->c_str());
00273 
00274                                 /*++colIt;
00275                                 entry.metrics.resize(cols.size() - 3);
00276                                 int colIdx = 0;
00277                                 for (; colIt!=cols.end(); colIt++, colIdx++)
00278                                 {
00279                                 if (extraColTypes[colIdx] == "float")
00280                                 {
00281                                 entry.metrics[colIdx].SetValueFloat((float)atof(colIt->c_str()));
00282                                 }
00283                                 else if (extraColTypes[colIdx] == "int")
00284                                 {
00285                                 entry.metrics[colIdx].SetValueInt32(atoi(colIt->c_str()));
00286                                 }
00287                                 else if (extraColTypes[colIdx] == "ubyte")
00288                                 {
00289                                 entry.metrics[colIdx].SetValueUInt8(CallToCode(colIt->c_str()));
00290                                 }
00291                                 }*/
00292 
00293                                 writer.WriteEntry(entry);
00294                         }
00295                         else
00296                         {
00297                                 break;
00298                         }
00299                 }
00300         }
00301 }
00302 
00303 static string InsertNum(string file, int n)
00304 {
00305         size_t idx = file.find_last_of(".");
00306         if(idx == 0)
00307         {
00308                 throw string("Improper outfile name:  " + file);
00309         }
00310         string result;
00311         stringstream sstrm;
00312         sstrm << n;
00313         string num = sstrm.str();
00314         if(idx > 0)
00315         {
00316                 result = file.substr(0, idx);
00317                 result = result.append("_");
00318                 result = result.append(num);
00319                 result = result.append(file.substr(idx, file.length() - idx));
00320         }
00321         else
00322         {
00323                 result = file.append("_");
00324                 result = result.append(num);
00325         }
00326         return result;
00327 }
00328 
00329 /*! Reads the genotype results from a simple TSV text file.
00330 * @param inFile The name of the input TSV file.
00331 * @param maxProbeSetNameLength The maximum length of the probe set names.
00332 */
00333 static unsigned long ReadData(const string &inFile, int &maxProbeSetNameLength)
00334 {
00335         // Open the file
00336         ifstream instr(inFile.c_str(), ios::in);
00337         if (!instr)
00338         {
00339                 throw string("Unable to read the input file");
00340         }
00341         
00342         char line[1024];
00343         // First line with header
00344         instr.getline(line, 1024);
00345         // Get the data
00346         maxProbeSetNameLength = 0;
00347 
00348         // count keeps track of the number of rows. This now handles what used to be the data list size
00349         // given we do not read and store the data in the list anymore, we needed this value for later
00350         // see the main function for how count is used from the return of this fuction.
00351         unsigned long count = 0;
00352         while (instr.getline(line, 1024))
00353         {
00354                 list<string> cols = ParseLine(line);
00355                 if(cols.size() > 0)
00356                 {
00357                         maxProbeSetNameLength = max(maxProbeSetNameLength, (int) cols.begin()->size());
00358                         ++count;
00359                 }
00360                 else
00361                 {
00362                         break;
00363                 }
00364         }
00365         return count;
00366 }
00367 
00368 /*! Show a help message on the use of the command line parameters. */
00369 static void Help()
00370 {
00371         const char *tab = "\t";
00372         cout << "The command line arguments include" << endl;
00373         cout << tab << "-copies <number of copies to generate - default is 1>" << endl;
00374         cout << tab << "-execid <the execution id>" << endl;
00375         cout << tab << "-cel <the name of the parent cel file>" << endl;
00376         cout << tab << "-biAllele <the name of the biallelic input data file, TSV with 1 header row>" << endl;
00377         cout << tab << "-multiAllele <the name of the multiallelic input data file, TSV with 1 header row>" << endl;
00378         cout << tab << "-copyNumber <the name of the copy number input data file, TSV with 1 header row>" << endl;
00379         cout << tab << "-out <the name of the output CHP file>" << endl;
00380         cout << tab << "-arrayType <the probe array type>" << endl;
00381         cout << tab << "-algName <the algorithm name>" << endl;
00382         cout << tab << "-algVersion <the algorithm version>" << endl;
00383         cout << tab << "-programName <the program name>" << endl;
00384         cout << tab << "-programVersion <the program version>" << endl;
00385         cout << tab << "-programCompany <the name of the company>" << endl;
00386         cout << tab << "-paramNames <a list of parameter names>" << endl;
00387         cout << tab << "-paramTypes <a list of parameter types> 1 = ascii, 2 = integer, 3 = float - default is ascii" << endl;
00388         cout << tab << "-paramValues <a list of parameter values>" << endl;
00389         cout << tab << "-sumNames <a list of summary parameter names>" << endl;
00390         cout << tab << "-sumTypes <a list of summary parameter types> 1 = ascii, 2 = integer, 3 = float - default is ascii" << endl;
00391         cout << tab << "-sumValues <a list of summary parameter values>" << endl;
00392         cout << tab << "-extraNames <a list of extra parameter names>" << endl;
00393         cout << tab << "-extraTypes <a list of extra parameter types> 1 = ascii, 2 = integer, 3 = float - default is ascii" << endl;
00394         cout << tab << "-extraValues <a list of extra parameter values>" << endl;
00395         cout << tab << "-delay <delay exit app exit in milliseconds - optional>" << endl;
00396         cout << endl;
00397         cout << "DmetMultiAllelic CHP:" << endl <<
00398                         "The input file must have the probe set name, call, confidence, force, allele count," << endl <<
00399                         " signal A, signal B, signal C, signal D, signal E, signal F," << endl <<
00400                         " context A, context B, context C, context D, context E, context F as the 17 columns. " << endl << endl <<
00401                         "DmetBiAllelic CHP:" << endl <<
00402                         "The input file must have the probe set name, call, confidence, force, signal A, signal B," << endl <<
00403                         " context A, context B as the 8 columns. " << endl << endl <<
00404                         "DmetCopyNumber CHP:" << endl <<
00405                         "The input file must have the probe set name, call, confidence, force, estimate, lower, upper as the 7 columns. ";
00406 }
00407 
00408 /*! The main entrance to the program. */
00409 int main(int argc, char * argv[])
00410 {
00411         try
00412         {
00413                 // Parse the command line arguments.
00414                 CCmdLine cmdLine;
00415                 if (cmdLine.SplitLine(argc, argv) < 1)
00416                 {
00417                         Help();
00418                         exit(-1);
00419                 }
00420 
00421                 int copies = atoi(cmdLine.GetSafeArgument("-copies", 0, "1").c_str());
00422                 int delay = atoi(cmdLine.GetSafeArgument("-delay", 0, "0").c_str());
00423                 string outFile = cmdLine.GetArgument("-out", 0);
00424                 CHPMultiDataData data(outFile);
00425                 string s = cmdLine.GetSafeArgument("-cel", 0, "");
00426                 if (s.length() > 0 && FileUtils::Exists(s.c_str()))
00427                 {
00428                         FusionCELData cel;
00429                         cel.SetFileName(s.c_str());
00430                         cel.ReadHeader();
00431                         GenericData *gdata = cel.GetGenericData();
00432                         if (gdata != NULL)
00433                         {
00434                                 data.GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr()->AddParent(*gdata->Header().GetGenericDataHdr()); 
00435                         }
00436                         cel.Close();
00437                 }
00438                 biAlleleIn = cmdLine.GetSafeArgument("-biAllele", 0, "");
00439                 if(!biAlleleIn.empty())
00440                 {
00441                         int maxProbeSetNameLength = 0;
00442                         unsigned long rowCount = ReadData(biAlleleIn, maxProbeSetNameLength);
00443                         data.SetEntryCount(DmetBiAllelicMultiDataType, rowCount, maxProbeSetNameLength);
00444                 }
00445                 multiAlleleIn = cmdLine.GetSafeArgument("-multiAllele", 0, "");
00446                 if(!multiAlleleIn.empty())
00447                 {
00448                         int maxProbeSetNameLength = 0;
00449                         unsigned long rowCount = ReadData(multiAlleleIn, maxProbeSetNameLength);
00450                         data.SetEntryCount(DmetMultiAllelicMultiDataType, rowCount, maxProbeSetNameLength);
00451                 }
00452                 copyNumberIn = cmdLine.GetSafeArgument("-copyNumber", 0, "");
00453                 if(!copyNumberIn.empty())
00454                 {
00455                         int maxProbeSetNameLength = 0;
00456                         unsigned long rowCount = ReadData(copyNumberIn, maxProbeSetNameLength);
00457                         data.SetEntryCount(DmetCopyNumberMultiDataType, rowCount, maxProbeSetNameLength);
00458                 }
00459                 s = cmdLine.GetArgument("-arrayType", 0);
00460                 data.SetArrayType(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(s));
00461                 s = cmdLine.GetArgument("-algName", 0);
00462                 data.SetAlgName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(s));
00463                 s = cmdLine.GetArgument("-algVersion", 0);
00464                 data.SetAlgVersion(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(s));
00465                 s = cmdLine.GetSafeArgument("-programName", 0, "");
00466                 if(!s.empty())
00467                 {
00468                         ParameterNameValueType param;
00469                         param.SetName(L"program-name");
00470                         param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(s));
00471                         data.GetGenericData().Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(param);
00472                 }
00473                 s = cmdLine.GetSafeArgument("-programVersion", 0, "");
00474                 if(!s.empty())
00475                 {
00476                         ParameterNameValueType param;
00477                         param.SetName(L"program-version");
00478                         param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(s));
00479                         data.GetGenericData().Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(param);
00480                 }
00481                 s = cmdLine.GetSafeArgument("-programCompany", 0, "");
00482                 if(!s.empty())
00483                 {
00484                         ParameterNameValueType param;
00485                         param.SetName(L"program-company");
00486                         param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(s));
00487                         data.GetGenericData().Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(param);
00488                 }
00489         
00490                 s = cmdLine.GetArgument("-execid", 0);
00491                 ParameterNameValueTypeList params;
00492                 ParameterNameValueType param;
00493                 param.SetName(L"exec-guid");
00494                 param.SetValueAscii(s);
00495                 params.push_back(param);
00496                 int n = cmdLine.GetArgumentCount("-paramNames");
00497                 for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
00498                 {
00499                         string paramName = cmdLine.GetArgument("-paramNames", i);
00500                         string paramType = cmdLine.GetSafeArgument("-paramTypes", i, "1");
00501                         string paramValue = cmdLine.GetArgument("-paramValues", i);
00502                         param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(paramName));
00503                         param.SetValueAscii(paramValue);
00504                         if(paramType == "2")
00505                         {
00506                                 param.SetValueInt32(atoi(paramValue.c_str()));
00507                         }
00508                         else if(paramType == "3")
00509                         {
00510                                 param.SetValueFloat((float)atof(paramValue.c_str()));
00511                         }
00512                         else
00513                         {
00514                                 param.SetValueAscii(paramValue);
00515                         }
00516                         params.push_back(param);
00517                 }
00518                 data.AddAlgParams(params);
00519                 params.clear();
00520                 n = cmdLine.GetArgumentCount("-sumNames");
00521                 for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
00522                 {
00523                         string sumName = cmdLine.GetArgument("-sumNames", i);
00524                         string sumType = cmdLine.GetSafeArgument("-sumTypes", i, "1");
00525                         string sumValue = cmdLine.GetArgument("-sumValues", i);
00526                         param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(sumName));
00527                         if(sumType == "2")
00528                         {
00529                                 param.SetValueInt32(atoi(sumValue.c_str()));
00530                         }
00531                         else if(sumType == "3")
00532                         {
00533                                 param.SetValueFloat((float)atof(sumValue.c_str()));
00534                         }
00535                         else
00536                         {
00537                                 param.SetValueAscii(sumValue);
00538                         }
00539                         params.push_back(param);
00540                 }
00541                 if (!params.empty())
00542                 {
00543                         data.AddSummaryParams(params);
00544                         params.clear();
00545                 }
00546                 n = cmdLine.GetArgumentCount("-extraNames");
00547                 for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
00548                 {
00549                         string extraName = cmdLine.GetArgument("-extraNames", i);
00550                         string extraType = cmdLine.GetSafeArgument("-extraTypes", i, "1");
00551                         string extraValue = cmdLine.GetArgument("-extraValues", i);
00552                         ParameterNameValueType param;
00553                         param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(extraName));
00554                         if(extraType == "2")
00555                         {
00556                                 param.SetValueInt32(atoi(extraValue.c_str()));
00557                         }
00558                         else if(extraType == "3")
00559                         {
00560                                 param.SetValueFloat((float)atof(extraValue.c_str()));
00561                         }
00562                         else
00563                         {
00564                                 param.SetValueAscii(extraValue);
00565                         }
00566                         data.GetGenericData().Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(param);
00567                 }       
00568 
00569                 for(int i = 0; i < copies; i++)
00570                 {
00571                         if(i > 0)
00572                         {
00573                                 string s = InsertNum(outFile, i);
00574                                 data.SetFilename(s);
00575                                 AffymetrixGuidType guid = AffymetrixGuid::GenerateNewGuid();
00576                                 data.GetGenericData().Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->SetFileId(guid);
00577                         }
00578                         CHPMultiDataFileWriter writer(data);
00579                         WriteBiAllelicData(writer);
00580                         WriteMultiAllelicData(writer);
00581                         WriteCopyNumberData(writer);
00582                 }
00583                 if(delay > 0)
00584                 {
00585                         Sleep(delay);
00586                 }
00587         }
00588         catch (string s)
00589         {
00590                 cout << s << endl;
00591                 Help();
00592         }
00593         catch (int e)
00594         {
00595                 cout << "Invalid argument" << endl;
00596                 Help();
00597         }
00598         catch (...)
00599         {
00600                 cout << "Unknown error" << endl;
00601                 Help();
00602         }
00603         return 0;
00604 }
